description: The large picture windows at this restaurant offer fine views of the Tyrrhenian sea, while the menu features imaginative recipes with a focus on fish and seafood. The most popular dishes include “Mamma Maria’s parmigiana”, the fish and shellfish soup, and the lemon dessert.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
